website_summaries.verdict: A simple design with fun fabrics and good fit make this swimsuit a winner for the no-fuss kind of kid.
pros: Functional drawstring closure for a better fit
cons: Have to buy a rash-guard separately

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought father-son matching trunks for my husband as his Fathers Days gift. He LOVES them! They are just the right length and cut right. Liner is great. Will be buying a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Dlkgunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been sweating high and low for a “shorter” fit bathing suit for my toddler! Finally found it and I am SO excited!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length, and fabric was good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m hoping these fit next year. They were shorter than the usual swim trunks, which is what I was looking for. Perfect length, and fabric was good quality, but not the thin fabric we love the most. They have a mesh liner. They are a little too big in the waist, but the drawstring helps fix that. They seem to rub my little boy’s thighs every time he wears them, so I’m hoping it’s just because they are still a little too big. He’s used to wearing the tight fitting speedo type shorts- he hates the feeling of wet baggy swim trunks on his legs. We will try these next year, hopefully with better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very cute !
customer_reviews.text: We got a 2t for my 2 1/2 year old . He had a small waist so without the adjustable waist they would have been to big ! Love the adjustable waist now he can use these for a few years. Awesome shorts!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I searched everywhere for above the knee swim trunks that my 10 year old HAD to have, these were the only ones I could find. They are a little bit longer than he wanted but overall good! He is pretty skinny and average height so I am not surprised at length! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these swim trunks. The fabric wasn't the quick-dry type but rather a cheap cotton material.
customer_reviews.author: EJK

customer_reviews.title: Just above the knee
customer_reviews.text: My son likes all shorts where he can "really move." He likes that these are shorter than all his other swim shorts, and they are flexible enough for him to run around in.
customer_reviews.author: futbol8188

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, super cute!
customer_reviews.text: These shorts are great. So much better than I even expected. My kid is short and thin and these for him appropriately. Most other shorts are too long. The drawstring is functional and the mesh lining is soft. They colors have held up after wear and washes.
customer_reviews.author: Bairdsley

customer_reviews.title: Small waist beware
customer_reviews.text: I really like these just wish the waist could be tightened more. My little guy is tall and skinny and these are a great length (as I like them to come above the knee and not be all baggy) but it still hangs if his waist a little bit even when it’s tied the tightest it can go. He’s 21 months and 96th percentile for height and 60th for weight and I ordered a 2T. At least his swim diaper will cover his crack when he squats down.
customer_reviews.author: Juli Mattos

customer_reviews.title: “They have pockets!”
customer_reviews.text: We have been through 3 pairs of swim trunks this summer (it’s only June!) looking for a pair that will actually fit and be cute for my son and these are it! They were a little longer than expected but I sized up (he wears a 7/8 but I ordered the 10/12 to be safe and with the draw strings there is no problem) so I just rolled them giving them a cute retro look which made them even cuter! Definitely recommend! And they have pockets which was a huge plus for him.haha
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect swim trunks for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: I was obsessed with the cute pattern of these trunks and couldn’t wait for my 2 year old to try them out. He is a bit on the skinny side, but the drawstring fixed that problem right away. He hasn’t complained about the feel or being “itchy” as he has done in the past with swim trunks. Breathable material, dries quickly. Washes great; we’ve had them for about a month now and they still look brand new. I’m also a big fan of the length of the shorts; they aren’t too long like board shorts and not too short either. They have a retro look about them and overall just adorable!
customer_reviews.author: MrsParisi

customer_reviews.title: So fun for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these shorts! My little guy is 6 and usually a 6/7 fits perfect. I decided to go up a size because he’s tall and he likes a knee length fit. The size 8 is perfect. The color and print is so fun. I would shy away from washing them in the machine and dryer. Hand wash and hang to dry. I would recommend ordering up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Leahredstar

customer_reviews.title: Like Chubbies and Trunks, but cheaper. My son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My 13YO son specifically asked me to leave a review for these shorts because he is so happy with them. He is lean and average height, and likes his shorts to look a bit tailored versus baggy or oversized. The size 10-12 shorts fit him perfectly. These are similar to Chubbies and Trunks, but much more affordable. He has several pairs of these that he wears to school, and constantly receives compliments on them. Note in the description that bigger boy sizes have a longer inseam, which isn’t depicted in the main photo.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo loves them
customer_reviews.text: My guy is 8, 79 lbs, lean build. I ordered size 8 (pink on right) and also size 7 (blue on left) because I've found that I always have to buy a size down in boys' swim suits. The 8 swallowed him. The 7 fits perfectly. He prefers a shorter swim suit and the 7 is shorter. In the fine print, it says the inseam for size 8 is longer than for size 7 as you can see from the photo. I think the fabric feels cheap, but he loves the suit; so that's all that matters I suppose. It does come with built in mesh underwear which we cut out.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute but no pockets
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but sadly they don’t have pockets I saw the other ones and even pictures have pockets but we got the navy blue with the colored sharks size 10/12 and NO Pockets! Which my son needs pockets in them, for medical reasons! Not sure yet if I will return them
customer_reviews.author: Cydney

customer_reviews.title: Mesh insert injured my 3 y/o
customer_reviews.text: I liked the swim trunks for awhile but after today I will no longer let my son wear them. The mesh “underwear” wrapped around the skin on his penis and cut him so badly, he now has a circular laceration on the underside of his penis. The poor thing doesn’t even want to urinate because it hurts so much. Not an appropriate forum to post pictures but it’s bad. If I had to do it over again I’d have cut the mesh out before having him wear the trunks.
customer_reviews.author: StayCee

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but liner is rough
customer_reviews.text: Super cute design but the liner in it was too rough on my son’s boy parts so I had to cut it out. A bummer considering the price. But they are well made and super cute. I ordered a 5/6 and a 7 and there didn’t seem to be all that much of a size difference between them as my 7 year old can wear both. With that being said I’d stick to your child’s pant size.
customer_reviews.author: NMM

customer_reviews.title: Love this swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is so cute and held up very well for three months of swimming in chlorinated pools. It never faded and was very cute. I loved this suit because my kids are kind of on the shorter side so I like swimsuits that are shorter and don’t look long and baggy on their little bodies! Super cute! The sizing was pretty accurate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged and runs really big
customer_reviews.text: We received our order today, but I’m so disappointed that the hole where the string ties is frayed. I emailed the company to see if we can get one that isn’t damaged in time for our trip in 6 days. Other than the fraying, the suit is super cute and colorful. It seems very soft material as well. Will update once I hear back from the company. The suit does run really big
customer_reviews.author: Aly Mann

customer_reviews.title: High quality, durable, and looks more expensive than what I paid!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of matching swim shorts for my husband and 4 year old son. They withstood pretty regular use all summer in the pool and at the beach without fading, staining, or wearing out. I was so impressed with the color, print, and quality of both the material and construction that I am purchasing additional prints for them for next year. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis M

customer_reviews.title: So Cute- with a Small Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and look designer brand. I purchased the pink anchor style. They are a shorter style but not something European. My toddler doesnt look good in a board short so these were great. Only gripe I have is that gge pockets always come out when he swims (and gets out). A little annoying and looks pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scheid

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Picked These Out
customer_reviews.text: Seems worth the money and my 2 year old grandson picked them out and he's happy with them. Fits him fine, would probably fit over a swim diaper too. Haven't had much use yet so not sure about wear and tear, but look like they will last the summer and since little kids grow fast that's all I expect.
customer_reviews.author: Wings

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These shorts are so nice for as cheap as they are! The patterns and colors are so unique and vibrant. I love that they aren't super long but long enough that my picky almost 5 year old doesn't think they are too short. I will always get his swim trunks from here from now on! So impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these swimming shorts!!! One of the best I’ve ever ever purchased!! The in between sizes is exactly what I need for my son and yet so hard to find!!! Quality is exceptional for the price!! And the length is perfect!! I’ll def be ordering more of these!!!
customer_reviews.author: BelB

customer_reviews.title: So glad I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I ordered these for my almost three year old. He is on the smaller side so I got him the 2T after reading reviews. They fit perfectly. I looked at several stores for the shorter style but couldn’t find any—until these. He loves them! And the mesh inside is very soft and comfortable. For reference, we ordered the ice cream cones style.
customer_reviews.author: J Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Fits big

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and style
customer_reviews.text: Big jump in size. I ordered 3 for my boys and the oldest's was much longer and very big. I ended up having them all size down and will get another smaller for my youngest. I'm keeping the larger suit so they can all size up when needed it will be a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!! Great material!

The anchors are navy borderline black. Bought matching shorts for my husband. The material is amazing quality! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit if you have a stocky boy

So while a 6 or 7 fits his waist comfortably, most swimsuits that size come below his knee which isn’t comfortable for swimming. This above knee swimsuit is just what he needed! Great value for money, not too short, and definitely not too long. I’ll be ordering more of these in different patterns!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Tockey

customer_reviews.title: Good shorts, maybe don’t put them in the dryer

customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who puts pockets in a swim trunk

customer_reviews.author: mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Cute

customer_reviews.title: Inflexible fabric

One was too large in the legs, the other too small in the waist. If you are a standard size and can typically find well fitting clothes easily get them. If you have difficulty getting clothes that fit just right, maybe go for a different option than these.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rios

customer_reviews.title: Love them!

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and soft!!!

customer_reviews.author: oxmanda1ox

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, short size is a bonus for little kids

These were perfect size-wise and the design is cute. The short size fits more appropriately for a little kid, and the shorts held up through the washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Dama

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow leg openings

customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Drawstring tie doesn’t stay tied / no elastic.
customer_reviews.text: There’s no elastic! It’s just a drawstring tie and what’s worse, the string doesn’t hold tied! There’s something about the rope that keeps it coming loose then untying. So your 5 year old will jump in the pool and the shorts will start falling off. Totally disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Neufeld

customer_reviews.title: Great cut, print and quality!

customer_reviews.author: andrea Mejtova

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, good quality, well priced!

customer_reviews.author: Tomi Von Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: I love it but is bigger I saved for next summer.

customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Adorable flamingo swim trunks!

customer_reviews.author: SKB

customer_reviews.title: Great product will order agian

customer_reviews.author: ally

With our large (tall) boys, I ordered their sizes or one larger and decided. Free returns made it easy to choose. LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Classy length
